Module HW3
Package HW3

Class SimpleTextEditor

java.lang.Object
HW3.SimpleTextEditor
public class SimpleTextEditor
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
TÃ¼rker Tercan SimpleTextEditor class is implemented to read and edit a text file in order to that, it stores text as characters in a list. All methods implemented two times (one for ListIterator one for basic for loop) because we want to measure which one is faster
